channel.title: Project Coordinator on BBSRC Bistability of Cell Cycle Transitions Project
channel.description: Recent content in Project Coordinator on BBSRC Bistability of Cell Cycle Transitions Project

item.title: charlotte_smith
item.description: Charlotte Smith has worked for the University of Oxford since 2004. She has worked in finance and management roles at the Doctoral Training Centre and the Oxford Centre for Integrative Systems Biology (OCISB). Recently she has been working with departments across the Medical Sciences Division on Athena SWAN processes. For the Bistability of Cell Cycle Transitions project Charlotte works in a part-time project management role.
